biocontainers.name: biokit
biocontainers.summary: Set of visualisation and analysis tools for biological data sets

biotools.summary: BioKIT is a versatile toolkit for processing and analyzing diverse types of sequence data. BioKIT is a UNIX shell toolkit for processing molecular sequence data.

bioschemas.summary: BioKIT is a versatile toolkit for processing and analyzing diverse types of sequence data. BioKIT is a UNIX shell toolkit for processing molecular sequence data.
